trans-unit.target: TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>By reconditioning the anima, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_001<tab>You may only recondition the anima of the weapon equipped when speaking with Ulan.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>The process can be canceled at any time.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A1_000_001<tab>Recondition the anima of a different weapon.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A2_000_002<tab>Recondition the anima of your equipped weapon.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_100_003<tab>In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_004<tab>You must equip your anima weapon before speaking with Ulan to proceed.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_100_004<tab>You must equip both the Sword and Shield of the Twin Thegns before speaking with Ulan to proceed.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_000<tab>Ardashir tells me you wish to alter the state of the anima, is that right?
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_001<tab>Assuming we do not attempt to push beyond its current limitations, this should be a trivial matter.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_002<tab>Mind you, this process requires crystal sand. If you have none, I will gladly furnish you with more per our original arrangement.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_003<tab>But you need not worry about umbrite. For this we require elementally aspected sand to ever so slightly alter the anima's aetherial composition.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_007<tab>Unless you have any other questions, let us begin!
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_Q1_000_020<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A1_000_021<tab>Recondition the anima.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A2_000_022<tab>Exchange items for crystal sand.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A3_000_023<tab>Ask about reconditioning.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_A4_000_024<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_010<tab>You appear to be out of crystal sand, my friend. If you would have more, then I must ask you bring me supplies in exchange.

TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_030<tab>To carefully modify the anima's aetherial composition, we must make use of crystal sand once more. The process is quite different from our previous endeavor, but thankfully much simpler.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_031<tab>Nevertheless, it still requires a fair amount of crystal sand. If you require more, you must supply me with materials in exchange. A deal is a deal, after all.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_032<tab>Oh, and you need not bother with the umbrite. Stripping the sand of its elemental aspect would be counterproductive this time.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_Q1_000_030<tab>Conclude your business with Ulan?
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_ULAN_000_050<tab>That went rather well, would you not agree? If you should have need of my services again, you have but to ask.
TEXT_JOBREL399_02334_SYSTEM_000_006<tab>The anima has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
